com.att.research.xacml.std.pip

Class StdMutablePIPResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.std.pip.StdMutablePIPResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PIPResponse
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StdSinglePIPResponse

    public class StdMutablePIPResponse
extends java.lang.Object
implements PIPResponse
    Mutable implementation of the PIPResponse interface with methods for keeping a collection of Attributes with a Status.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.2 $
    Author:
    Christopher A. Rath

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StdMutablePIPResponse()
      Creates a new StdMutablePIPResponse with an OK Status.
      StdMutablePIPResponse(Attribute attribute)
      Creates a new StdMutablePIPResponse with an OK Status and the single given Attribute.
      StdMutablePIPResponse(java.util.Collection<Attribute> attributesIn)
      Creates a new StdMutablePIPResponse with an OK Status and a copy of the given Collection of Attributes.
      StdMutablePIPResponse(Status statusIn)
      Creates a new StdMutablePIPResponse with the given Status.

      Gets the Status of the request to retrieve attributes from a PIPEngine.

      • isSimple

        public boolean isSimple()
        Description copied from interface: PIPResponse
        Determines if this PIPResponse is simple or not. A simple PIPResponse contains a single Attribute whose AttributeValues are all of the same data type.
        Specified by:
        isSimple in interface PIPResponse
        Returns:
        true if this PIPResponse is simple, else false.

      • getAttributes

        public java.util.Collection<Attribute> getAttributes()
        Description copied from interface: PIPResponse
        Gets the Collection of Attributes returned from a PIPEngine. The caller must not modify the returned Collection. The implementation is free to enforce this with unmodifiable collections.
        Specified by:
        getAttributes in interface PIPResponse
        Returns:
        The Collection of Attributes returned or an empty list if none are found
